spec_data.Name: alfont
spec_data.Description:
alfont also known as AllegroFont or AlFont is a wrapper around the freetype2
library for use with the Allegro game library. Thus allowing the display of
text using freetype fonts on Allegro bitmaps.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 10:59:48 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Font rendering library for the Allegro game library
